languages.text: "Раз уж ты ведьма, то будь полезной: построй свои шепотки в шеренгу и научи их уже, Трон меня разрази, докладывать по форме".
languages.translation_comment:
Aboard a corrupted Tech-Priest ship.
Idira: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."

traits.locale_text: "Раз уж ты ведьма, то будь полезной: построй свои шепотки в шеренгу и научи их уже, Трон меня разрази, докладывать по форме".

languages.text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"
languages.translation_comment:
Aboard a corrupted Tech-Priest ship.
Idira: "Oh... Poison runs through mechanical veins... The path to your goal seems easy as long as you do not turn back. Fire rages in an iron heart..."
languages.original_text: "Раз уж ты ведьма, то будь полезной: построй свои шепотки в шеренгу и научи их уже, Трон меня разрази, докладывать по форме".

traits.locale_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

"Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

languages.text: 「どうせお前は魔女なんだから、だったら頼む―玉座にかけて、囁き声どもにちゃんと整列して報告させる訓練くらいしてくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

traits.locale_text: 「どうせお前は魔女なんだから、だったら頼む―玉座にかけて、囁き声どもにちゃんと整列して報告させる訓練くらいしてくれないか？」

languages.text: "Ihr seid ja ohnehin eine Hexe, könnt Ihr uns vielleicht einen Gefallen tun, im Namen des Throns, und Euren Flüsterstimmen beibringen, sich ordentlich aufzureihen und Bericht zu erstatten?"
languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ja ohnehin eine Hexe, könnt Ihr uns vielleicht einen Gefallen tun, im Namen des Throns, und Euren Flüsterstimmen beibringen, sich ordentlich aufzureihen und Bericht zu erstatten?"

languages.text: « Par le Trône, si nous devons tolérer la présence d'une sorcière dans nos rangs, tâchez au moins de vous rendre utile en apprenant à vos murmures à s'exprimer correctement. »
languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône, si nous devons tolérer la présence d'une sorcière dans nos rangs, tâchez au moins de vous rendre utile en apprenant à vos murmures à s'exprimer correctement. »

languages.text: «Ya que es bruja, ¿por qué no nos hace un favor, en el nombre del Trono, y enseña a sus susurros a informar como es debido?».
languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

traits.locale_text: «Ya que es bruja, ¿por qué no nos hace un favor, en el nombre del Trono, y enseña a sus susurros a informar como es debido?».

languages.text: “既然你是个女巫，那你能不能以黄金王座的名义帮我们一个忙？能不能训练一下那些低语，让它们排成一排，按顺序进行报告？”
languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

traits.locale_text: “既然你是个女巫，那你能不能以黄金王座的名义帮我们一个忙？能不能训练一下那些低语，让它们排成一排，按顺序进行报告？”

languages.text: "Madem cadısın, Taht'ın yüzü suyu hürmetine bize bir iyilik yap da fısıltılarına sırayla, doğru düzgün rapor vermeyi öğret."
languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"

traits.locale_text: "Madem cadısın, Taht'ın yüzü suyu hürmetine bize bir iyilik yap da fısıltılarına sırayla, doğru düzgün rapor vermeyi öğret."

languages.original_text: "Since you're a witch anyway, would you do us a favour, in the Throne's name, and train your whispers to line up and report properly?"
